page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF (CONT>
page.content: We had arranged to meet Mr.Michael Jopling,M.P.,the Minister of Agriculture. {Why were you meeting him? To discuss the situation in farming at present. {Was your meeting successful? Yes,it went well,although I don't think we persuaded him to change his mind on anything. {Who are 'we'?} Myself and three farming members from Barton under Needwood and the N.F.U. secretary from Uttoxeter and three of his members. {What time did you finish? About 19.30.I arrived home at about 20.15. { { { {
